original_text: i kept wishing i was watching a documentary about the wartime navajos and what they accomplished instead of all this specious hollywood hoo-ha .
generated_text:

2. "the over-the-top action scenes and cheesy dialogue made me roll my eyes, it was a waste of time."
3. "i was expecting a gritty and realistic portrayal of war, but what i got was a shallow, Hollywoodized version."
